name: Supercar Fighter Jet With A Machine Gun (PRE-ALPHA)
name_original: Supercar Fighter Jet With A Machine Gun (PRE-ALPHA)
description:
The retro top-down bullet hell arcade shooter where the enemies attack to the beat. Description

You are Whip. You are a racecar driver in an airplane racing world. 

You are sick of it.

You, with all four of your brain cells, decide to piece together a fighter jet using nothing but a racecar, a machine gun, and a fighter jet.

And soon, you will be competing in the deadliest airplane racing competition in the world...

Oh, and did I mention that this is a bullet hell arcade shooter? With that description, I'm sure I didn't need to tell you that, but yeah.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD / Joystick : Move

Up / X : Shoot

Down / A : Slow

Left / Left Bumper : Dash Left

Right / Right Bumper : Dash Right

Escape / Start : Pause

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
